sn49.23-34:1: "Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ye keci balakaraṇīyā kammantā kayiranti, sabbe te pathaviṁ nissāya pathaviyaṁ patiṭṭhāya evamete balakaraṇīyā kammantā kayiranti; evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlaṁ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro sammappadhāne bhāveti, cattāro sammappadhāne bahulīkaroti.
sn49.23-34:2: Balaṁ bījañca nāgo ca,rukkho kumbhena sūkiyā;Ākāsena ca dve meghā,nāvā āgantukā nadīti.
